name: Mad Crab Grab
description:
Feed the crab by throwing snails and other objects by clicking and dragging. Hypnotic tunes remind you of the crabs limited patience. Up your streaks by scoring some swooshes- getting rewarded with big bonuses and ear candy in the process. Under active development. Made with Godot Engine 3.2.3

Some of the sounds in this project were created by David McKee (ViRiX)
soundcloud.com/virix

Additional sounds by https://opengameart.org/users/artisticdude, Zgump
